name: Disneyland® Paris
description: A world-renowned theme park offering a magical experience with attractions and entertainment for all ages.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: An iconic symbol of Paris, offering breathtaking views of the city from its observation decks.
location: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris

name: Louvre Museum
description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris, home to thousands of works of art including the Mona Lisa.
